responses.gpt4: I understand, Mr. Winner. Being pain-free and having improved mobility can make a big difference in one's life. We will do our best to support you throughout this process. Please, don't hesitate to contact us if you need anything else or have further questions.
responses.our_model: I can hear your determination, Mr. Winner. It's inspiring. Now, let's discuss the next part of your preparation, which is when to stop eating and drinking before your procedure.
